document_data.mainbody: Ilyyela Miritar was the wife of Seiveril Miritar, leader of the Miritar clan of elves on the island of Evermeet. She was killed in 1371 DR during the war launched by Kymil Nimesin when the Tower of the Sun was destroyed. Seiveril attempted to resurrect her, but she refused to return from Arvandor, telling him that he would fulfill his role in the mortal world before joining her.
